segments.text: I would like to open an account please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any form of ID ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have my Tennis Club card . Is that good enough ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid not . It has to be a passport or a valid driver ’ s license .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ... wait a minute ... here ’ s my driver ’ s license .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , just fill in this application . You can sit over there . This brochure explains our services . We have free checking , and you will be given a debit card and on ATM card . There is no service
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I ’ ll fill out the form and come right back .
segments.speaker: S1
